descriptionHtml:
This archive contains ONLY textures and meshes!If you have \"grey head\" bug this files should help.
ESP file is available here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=126850391
DAWNGUARD REQUIRED!!! 

Igneus is old vampire but still very strong. 

+Leveling: 10-83 (slightly faster leveling than Dovahkiin) 

+Skills: 
-Onehanded (dual wielding included) 
-Archery 
-Block 
-Heavy Armor 
-Frost breath shout 

+Location: 
Morthal.Behind Falion\'s house. 
Look at the screenshots for alternative way.
author: Hebephryo
